law.catch_line: Houseboat with marine toilet to have marine sanitation device.
law.text: No houseboat equipped with marine toilet facilities shall be on the waters of the Commonwealth unless the houseboat is equipped with a marine sanitation device.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 263, sec. 3, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 71, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 263, sec. 21, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. III, sec. 13(2). -- Amended 1972 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 54. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 261, sec. 4.
